notes: AI systems for creditworthiness assessment and credit scoring are high-risk (Annex III)
AI systems for risk assessment and pricing in life/health insurance are high-risk (Annex III)
AI medical devices and diagnostic systems are high-risk (Annex III); AI in healthcare management covered
AI for access to public services, benefits, emergency services is high-risk (Annex III)
AI safety components in vehicles are high-risk as per product safety legislation (Annex I)
AI in aviation safety management is high-risk (Annex I references aviation regulations)
AI recommender systems on VLOPs have transparency requirements; high-risk if used for content moderation
AI in critical infrastructure management may be high-risk; grid management AI covered
AI safety components in machinery are high-risk (Annex I); general manufacturing AI may be limited risk
All AI systems interacting with humans have transparency obligations (Art 50); emotion recognition and biometric categorization restricted
